::Hot Rod::

He opened a continues berage of optic lasers, plasma charges, =
and
missiles at Mobster.

Mobster:

Mobster was pretty unmoving, and the bl=
asts all cut into his armor. Mobster fires on Hot Rod with the combined mac=
hine guns of all 5 Mafia, 20 bullets.

::WarMachine/Zardus/Bloodystrike/Rep=
tilica/DevilDuer::

WarMachine takes a step back to steady himself as the c=
harge hits him, making 
another dent in his armor.

He roars as he looks do=
wn at Mobster, firing two missiles at him along with a 
dozen rapid shots f=
rom his shoulder guns.

OOC: How big is WarMachine anyway?

BIC: Mobster:

=
Mobster is pushed backwards by the rapid shots, then fired 1 missile at War=
Machine before the missiles connected. Mobster doubles over from the size o=
f WarMachine's missiles. He throws a charge at WarMachine.

Zardus dives ag=
ain, a few autogun shots hitting him, much more missing 
barely. He was sta=
rting to leak mech fluid.

His eyes narrow as he aims his launcher, firing =
it at one of the bigger 
autoguns.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike sto=
ps in the forest, being able to see a few of the autoguns 
through the tree=
s. Pulling up his missile launcher, he fires a missile at the 
autoguns.
~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica stabalizes in the air, a few feet above the=
 canopy and out of range 
of most of the shots. Seeing Zardus fire on the a=
utoguns, Reptilica does the 
same, two missiles flying at the Mafia base's =
autoguns.

Big Autogun: The Big autogun takes damage, smashing in the side.=
 It fires on the attackers, still.

Small autoguns: They just keep getting =
destroyed, with no defenses like the big autoguns. The remaining 9 fire at =
the Alliance...
